Detailed Description

A widget that renders a virtual Keyboard.

It handles rendering of keys and detecting key presses and touch movements. 

 #include <gaia/service/IMEKeyboardWidget.h>

 class MyKeyboardWidget : public gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget {
     //members and function declaration here
 };

 MyKeyboardWidget* myKeyboardWidget = new gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget();
 IMEService::initialKeyboardWidget(myKeyboardWidget, Resource_ID);
 myKeyboardWidget->setOnKeyboardActionListener(IMEService);
 myKeyboardWidget->setKeyboard(IMEKeyboard);
 delete myKeyboardWidget;

Definition at line 39 of file IMEKeyboardWidget.h.

Returns the enabled state of the key feedback popup.

Returns:
whether or not the key feedback popup is enabled
See also:

virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::isProximityCorrectionEnabled ( ) [virtual]

Returns true if proximity correction is enabled.

Returns:
True if proximity correction is enabled, false is disabled.
virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::isShifted ( ) [virtual]

Returns the state of the shift key of the keyboard which set in this keyboard widget.

Returns:
True if the shift state is in a pressed state, false otherwise. If there is no shift key on the keyboard or there is no keyboard attached, it returns false.
virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::onLongPress ( const IMEKeyboardKey &  key) [virtual]

Called when a key is long pressed.

By default this will open any popup keyboard associated with this key through the attributes popupLayout and popupCharacters.

Parameters:
[in]keyThe key that was long pressed.
Returns:
True if the event is handled, false otherwise.

Returns:
True if the event is handled, false otherwise.

virtual void gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::setPreviewEnabled ( bool  previewEnabled) [virtual]

Enables or disables the key feedback popup.

This is a popup that shows a magnified version of the depressed key. By default the preview is enabled.

Parameters:
previewEnabledwhether or not to enable the key feedback popup
See also:
isPreviewEnabled()
virtual void gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::setProximityCorrectionEnabled ( bool  enabled) [virtual]

When enabled, calls to onKey(int32_t, const Vector<int32_t>&) will include key codes for adjacent keys.

When disabled, only the primary key code will be reported.

Parameters:
[in]enabledTrue to enable adjacent keys, false only primary key.
virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboardWidget::setShifted ( bool  shifted) [virtual]

Set the state of the shift key in keyboard which set in this keyboard widget.

Parameters:
[in]shiftedTrue to enable the state of the shift key, false otherwise.
Returns:
True if the shift key state changed, false if there was no change.
